Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I estimate its worth to be $12000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as the product has been designed to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your operations with our product. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
